summary: A schoolteacher teams up with with a priest to stop a town being overrun by vampires.
cast: Karen Black|Peter DeLuise|Ami Dolenz|Maya McLaughlin|Evan MacKenzie|David Sawyer|Shirley Spiegler Jacobs|Josette DiCarlo|Lloyd J. Kalicki|Daniel Arthur Wray|Roger Perkovich|Ray Maurin|Stacy Montezon|Bekki Vallin|Butch Mounce|Brad Overturf|Garrett Morris|Sean McKeever
title: Hijos de la noche
